metadata.synopsis: Player characters comment on the rusty weapons found in Ketheric City - meant to establish how long it's been since Grymforge was occupied.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the rusty weapons for the first time at any of these locations:-604; 18; 402-639; 22; 459-653; 27; 430-603; 22; 462-610; 19; 393-583; 20; 302-647; 19; 379

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Half rust - whoever owned those weapons has been gone for some time.
